attributes.action: change lesislation for age of children walking dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many of us may agree a 5 year old girl walking a large stffordshire bull terrier is wrong. there are too many insidents where yound children are walking dogs which are far too strong and ill mannered for them to cope. i propose that there should be an age limit of at lest 16 for dogs weighing no more tan 25kg and 18 for dogs over 25kg-40kg and 21+ for dogs over 45kg. nomatter what breed or tempermant i think this should be the law. and i hope many people would agree.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
